body: Would be decent if it wasn’t ugly bastard

SadlyAddicted, yes it's more of a odd love story the girl it's a loner no friends or bf, I suspect the school kids were intimidated by her perfect looks and girls hated her, the good looking teacher she liked was never gonna hit on her so that leaves her with the fat ugly teacher which was another loner, both got what they wanted fat teacher cleared his debt and got a 10/10 girl, and she got a guy that constantly wanted to be with her, she was even thankful that got into this situation and didn't care if the fat teacher lied to get her.
If you liked this I have the great news bunnywalker already release the animation of this chapter which it's really good.
Lol this ain't even ntr. She's a delusional girl crushing on a teacher that sees her as a student and that already has a wife or girlfriend
Holy shit that final panel was fucking precious. 10/10
